languages.text: {n}Кассия презрительно кривится.{/n} "Сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бог-Император{/g} благословил наш род бороздить {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Море Душ{/g}, дабы Человечество могло прикоснуться к звездам. Видимо, ваши глаза застилает белесый туман, сквозь который не видно их света".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия презрительно кривится.{/n} "Сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бог-Император{/g} благословил наш род бороздить {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Море Душ{/g}, дабы Человечество могло прикоснуться к звездам. Видимо, ваши глаза застилает белесый туман, сквозь который не видно их света".

languages.text: {n}Cassia's mouth twists contemptuously.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} Himself blessed our kind to sail the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} so that Humanity could reach the stars. Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия презрительно кривится.{/n} "Сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бог-Император{/g} благословил наш род бороздить {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Море Душ{/g}, дабы Человечество могло прикоснуться к звездам. Видимо, ваши глаза застилает белесый туман, сквозь который не видно их света".

Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

{n}Cassia's mouth twists contemptuously.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} Himself blessed our kind to sail the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} so that Humanity could reach the stars. Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅的嘴角露出了轻蔑的笑容。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}亲自赐福于我们这种人，让我们得以在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}灵魂之海{/g}上航行，从而让人类的足迹踏遍星间。很显然，你的双眼被白雾遮住了，无法透过它看到群星的光明。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's mouth twists contemptuously.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} Himself blessed our kind to sail the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} so that Humanity could reach the stars. Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅的嘴角露出了轻蔑的笑容。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}亲自赐福于我们这种人，让我们得以在{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}灵魂之海{/g}上航行，从而让人类的足迹踏遍星间。很显然，你的双眼被白雾遮住了，无法透过它看到群星的光明。”

languages.text: {n}カシアの口元が侮蔑的にゆがむ。{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}「神帝陛下{/g}は、人類が星に到達するために、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}を航海することをあたくしたちに祝福をくだされました。陛下の目は白い霧に覆われており、それを通して星の光を知覚することはできないのは明らかです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's mouth twists contemptuously.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} Himself blessed our kind to sail the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} so that Humanity could reach the stars. Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの口元が侮蔑的にゆがむ。{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}は、人類が星に到達するために、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}を航海することを私たちに祝福をくだされました。あなたの目は白い霧に覆われており、それを通して星の光を知覚することはできないのは明らかです」
{n}カシアの口元が侮蔑的にゆがむ。{/n}{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}「神帝陛下{/g}は、人類が星に到達するために、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}を航海することをあたくしたちに祝福をくだされました。陛下の目は白い霧に覆われており、それを通して星の光を知覚することはできないのは明らかです」

languages.text: {n}Cassias Mundwinkel verziehen sich verächtlich.{/n} "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} höchstselbst hat die Unseren gesegnet, damit sie auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Meer der Seelen{/g} segeln und die Menschheit zu den Sternen bringen. Euer Blick muss vernebelt sein, und darum könnt Ihr das Licht der Sterne nicht wahrnehmen."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's mouth twists contemptuously.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} Himself blessed our kind to sail the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} so that Humanity could reach the stars. Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassias Mundwinkel verziehen sich verächtlich.{/n} "Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} höchstselbst hat die Unseren gesegnet, damit sie auf dem {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Meer der Seelen{/g} segeln und die Menschheit zu den Sternen bringen. Euer Blick muss vernebelt sein, und darum könnt Ihr das Licht der Sterne nicht wahrnehmen."

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Cassia se tordent de mépris.{/n} « L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} en personne a béni les miens pour permettre à l'humanité de naviguer sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mer des Âmes{/g} et atteindre les étoiles. Manifestement, le voile blanc qui obscurcit votre vision vous empêche de percevoir la lumière des étoiles. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's mouth twists contemptuously.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} Himself blessed our kind to sail the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} so that Humanity could reach the stars. Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Cassia se tordent de mépris.{/n} « L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} en personne a béni les miens pour permettre à l'humanité de naviguer sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mer des Âmes{/g} et atteindre les étoiles. Manifestement, le voile blanc qui obscurcit votre vision vous empêche de percevoir la lumière des étoiles. »

languages.text: {n}La boca de Cassia esboza una mueca de desdén.{/n} «El mismísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} ha bendecido a nuestra gente para que navegue por el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mar de Almas{/g}, permitiendo así que la Humanidad llegue a las estrellas. Sin embargo, usted no puede ver la luz de las estrellas porque sus ojos están tapados por una neblina blanca».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's mouth twists contemptuously.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} Himself blessed our kind to sail the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} so that Humanity could reach the stars. Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

traits.locale_text: {n}La boca de Cassia esboza una mueca de desdén.{/n} «El mismísimo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} ha bendecido a nuestra gente para que navegue por el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}mar de almas{/g}, permitiendo así que la Humanidad llegue a las estrellas. Sin embargo, usted no puede ver la luz de las estrellas porque sus ojos están tapados por una neblina blanca».

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın dudakları nefretle bükülüyor.{/n} "Türüm, İnsanlık {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ruhlar Denizi'ne{/g} açılabilsin ve yıldızlara erişebilsin diye bizzat {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g} Hazretleri tarafından kutsanmıştır. Belli ki gözlerin beyaz sis ile perdelenmiş ve o sisin ardındaki yıldızların ışığını algılayamıyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's mouth twists contemptuously.{/n} "The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} Himself blessed our kind to sail the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g} so that Humanity could reach the stars. Clearly, your eyes are veiled with white fog, and through it you cannot perceive the stars' light."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia'nın dudakları nefretle bükülüyor.{/n} "Türüm, İnsanlık {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ruhlar Denizi{/g}'ne açılabilsin ve yıldızlara erişebilsin diye bizzat {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g} tarafından kutsanmıştır. Belli ki gözlerin beyaz sis ile perdelenmiş ve o sisin ardındaki yıldızların ışığını algılayamıyorsun."
